alert.note: Alert for Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 1:07PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wakulla, south central Gadsden, east central Liberty and southern Leon Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 106 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles west of Crawfordville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida State University, St. Marks, Tallahassee Community College, Crawfordville, Florida A and M, Doak Campbell Stadium, Wakulla, Lake Bradford, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Wakulla Springs, Walker Ford Community Center, South City, Eight Mile Pond, Medart, Bloxham and Bethel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty
